author: leosimons
msg: * xdok10.dtd: fix to be a valid DTD.
* validdate: new sample tool to run xmllint on xdocs files in isolation (Eg without building).
* xmlcatalog.xml: new xml catalog for use with libxml that uses local copies of xhtml specs.
* build: update build tool to use xmllint for validation (it will just complain if validation fails).
* test/basic-test.sh: update to work with validating command and template parsing.

author: jta
msg: Derby Tutorial: added more specific doc links to the ij and network server

author: nadiramra
msg: Make error message consistent with what is expected.
On OS/400, the error message is different.

author: leosimons
msg: Turn xdocs files into HTML documents instead of 'full' XML, so that dumb non-validating parsers (eg python's default parser) don't try to do things like namespacing.

author: leosimons
msg: templates/site.kid.html, build: make the 'build' script run the documentation files to transform through a Kid template.
